item.title: Object help
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

ill, look it up in my client…damn your lucky lol [code] } else if (command.startsWith(“object”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“james”))
{

	try
	{
		int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
                    int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12,13));
                    int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(14));
          createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
	}
	catch(Exception e) 
	{
		sendMessage("Bad object ID"); 
	}[/code]

replace james with your name and you should b all set : )

Read full topic
